title: The Thomas Crown Affair
description: This 1st ever edition shows Steve McQueen and Faye Dunaway on the cover. You've pulled the most outrageous caper in the history of capers and stolen 2 million bucks but youv'e been found out be a delightfully dotty lady detective using pure blind feminine intuition. What's your next move? Pull another caper, only this time tell the detective what you are going to do before you do it!
author: Evan Lee Heyman
